Title: Prema Geema Jane Do
Writer: Kenja Chethan Kumar (story), Kenja Chethan Kumar (screenplay), Kenja Chethan Kumar (dialogue), Arasu Anthare (lyricist)
Actors: Gowtham Ghatke, Pallavi Gowda, Shruthi Thimmaiah, Sheetal Shetty
Plot: Prema Geema Jaane Do is a soft romantic comedy. The movie is about the protagonist setting up a journey to a new place and meeting new people.Why he hates love and what is in his past forms the main crux of the story.
